document.full_text: gusty winds and half-empty stands gave no sense of the usual parisian glamour as last year's french open runner-up samantha stosur began with an easy win on sunday and lleyton hewitt pulled out injured.
document.title: stosur untroubled on low-key sunday start
lines_and_colors: gusty winds and half-empty stands gave no sense of the usual parisian glamour as last year's french open runner-up samantha stosur began with an easy win on sunday and lleyton hewitt pulled out injured.
